rv, Hamas logo definitely does not depict the State of Israel.
Historic Palestine included Jordan and generally didn't include the Negev desert in the south
rv, Hamas logo definitely does not depict the State of Israel. It depicts historic Palestine, an area currently occupied by the Zionist entity
remove POV editorializing verbiage; Hamas came into existence long after the State of Israel, so it is "what was then" the State of Israel as well. Also, no need to bludgeon readers with propaganda.
Shouldn't the intro at least briefly describe their goal and purpose?
/* Beliefs */ Making this point more explicit. These are the groups teachings, whether we agree or disagree.
images have captions which describe them; this is a Wikipedia standard
Logo: No propaganda insinuations. Readers can discern for themselves what is depicted. See Talk.
Ok, the text reverts were fine. But lets describe their logo accurately.
